entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Checked JIT: "BBF_HAS_IDX_LEN is not set" assert #61705
    7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] We should enforce that services packages specify `ServicingVersion` when in a servicing release. #61694
    6.0.x
  • Mono jit/hardwareintrinsics/x86/x86base/pause tests failing #61693
  • Race condition writing Microsoft.Interop.DllImportGenerator.dll during library product build (Windows x64 Release) #61687
  • [Mono] Add support for DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute #61685
    7.0.0
  • BindToDirectory throws NullReferenceException on Linux when LdapConnection AuthType is Anonymous #61683
  • sigsegv crash on macos net50 aspnetcore #61702
  • Performance Regression in Concurrent (Stack/Queue)? #61673
  • [mini] gshared: Implement static virtual method `constrained.ldftn` in the JIT #61672
    7.0.0
  • A self-built crossgen2 hangs on some recent Linux distributions #61671
  • Add support for clearing ConfigurationManager sources (was possible in version 5) #61675
  • Garbage collection method is not manageable by environment variables in .net 6 #61674
  • Avoid need for pragma warning disables in Regex source generator #61666
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Handle exceptions while evaluating expressions #61665
  • Performance Improvement: Value Range Test #61664
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest222\\Generated222\\Generated222.cmd #61647
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\lcs\\_speed_rellcsbox\\_speed_rellcsbox.cmd #61646
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.IncrementalGenerationTests.ChangingMarshallingStrategy_RegeneratesStub #61643

Closed

  • SSL/TLS handshake fails in Ubuntu 20.04 and Net 5.0 using mysql server container #59986
    7.0.0
  • Supported Versions in SslStream #61051
    7.0.0
  • Decode content-disposition header #61197
    7.0.0
  • [.NET 6] UriBuilder breaking change not documented #61363
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.GetCustomAttribute(Type) returns null on .Net5 #61661
  • HTTP/3: InvalidOperationException with many streams on a connection #55249
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json SignalR Hub issue #61648
  • Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_ADD, GT_SUB)' in 'Matrix:GetHashCode():int:this' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' (IL size 96) #61629
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Byte #61374
    7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] HostActivationTest has been crashing on macOS #61636
    6.0.x
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59061
    7.0.0
  • Pin FileVersions in platform manifest for the ref packs in the servicing #61216
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [DllImportGenerator] Enable on projects without System.Memory and System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe #61704
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add packaging changes for System.Text.Json #61703
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove some unnecessary slicing from generated Regex code #61701
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Upload dasm files as artifacts #61700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ignore missing data result from superpmi-replay run #61699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add single char lazy loop support to simplified Regex code gen #61698
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable native ports package validation #61697
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] DRAFT #61696
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove race condition from DllImportGenerator build #61695
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove XUnit reference metadata from tests I switched over last week #61691
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout and add env var option #61688
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • File.CopyTo: try to pre-allocate disk space for large destination files #61676
    area-System.IO, os-linux, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Follow up changes for 61590 #61670
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS (#61590) #61659
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Remove `DisableImplicitNamespaceImports_DotNet` #61656
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #61655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Include hashes of containing types when computing hash in EEClassHashTable #61652
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area-owners to reflect Libraries Area Pod changes #61642
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Create runtime clone to manually kick off full test runs #61641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update SPCL to use GeneratedDllImport where possible. #61640
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Merged

  • Generate .runsettings file to be able to run and debug tests on vscode in codespace with prebuild #61684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [arm64] JIT: Make 0.0 containable for fcmp #61617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DllImportGenerator] Stop ignoring QCalls when looking for methods to convert to GeneratedDllImport #61678
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable activation host tests that fail with a 6.0 RC2 or newer SDK #61654
    area-Host
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1472678 #61680
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use GeneratedDllImport for blittable p/invokes in System.IO.Compression, System.IO.Compression.Brotli, System.Net.Http, System.Net.NameResolution #61638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Provide locations for src-gen diagnostic output #61614
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Update WASM README.md #61681
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Improvement of memory consumption while Evaluating Expressions #61470
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Rework fetch #61639
  • Fix poisoning for very large structs #61521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable fgMorphCastedBitwiseOp opt for floats #61657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SuperPMI Python script Azure usage #61650
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stabilize upgrade codes for host msi #61606
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Give create codespaces prebuild action right permissions #61651
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stabilize upgrade code and dependency key for host msi #61619
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Provide locations for src-gen diagnostic output #61430
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Add tests for CNG key algorithm mismatches #61211
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • XArch: Trim the code block to match the actual code length #61523
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Only run JIT formatting job if there are JIT changes #61632

Updated

  • JIT: don't import IL for partial compilation blocks #61572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upload checked JITs for Release branches and introduce jitmap.txt #61597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms to System.Security.Cryptography #61543
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update docker image #61217
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #61631
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] renames and cleanup before modularization #61596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update `GetPinnableReference()` usage in multi-step custom type marshalling #61539
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 3 #61435
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add a JsonWriterOptions.MaxDepth property #61608
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout to thirty seconds #61621
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add [Fact] attributes to all remaining ilproj tests #61625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Tie sdb agent lifetime to the ExecutionContext and simplify the api #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fix the inclusion of generic instances when doing profile… #61627
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add nested static attribute support. #61508
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [DRAFT][private] Fix xunit xharness fails #61595
    arch-wasm
  • Minor File.ReadAllBytes* improvements #61519
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Avoid computing a vtable arg for ctors which don't need it. #61512
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable DD117522 test #61585
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
